result.execSummary:
The defendant Jerome Demetrius Burks Jr was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jerome Demetrius Burks Jr

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Sentencing proceeded.  Statements by the State, defense and defendant. 

AS TO COUNT 1:

Court orders Defendant to pay a fine of $250.00 plus all mandatory court costs, fees, assessments and surcharges, including the DNA surcharge, BY 12/20/2016. Failure to pay will result in immediate entry of civil judgment subject to tax intercept. 
- Provide DNA sample, if not already done. 

Appellate rights notice given to the defendant.

Defendant Jerome Demetrius Burks in court with attorney Robert J Hampton.  Jessica Bellows appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: AMI

Parties have reached a resolution in this matter.
Plea hearing proceeded. Negotiations placed on the record and confirmed by defense counsel and defendant.

AS TO COUNT 1:

The defendant was advised of his Constitutional rights and maximum penalties, waived all rights, plead GUILTY and was examined as to the plea.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights, Jury Instructions and Addendum to Plea Questionnaire and Waiver of Rights received and filed.  The parties stipulate to the complaint as a factual basis for the plea.  The Court found the defendant guilty and ordered entry of Judgment of Conviction.

Defendant advised that if he is not a US citizen deportation is possible. 

Case proceeded to sentencing hearing.

Defendant Jerome Demetrius Burks in court with attorney Robert J Hampton.  Jessica Bellows appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: sm
Case set for Final Pretrial. Case remains in Jury trial posture. Case remains calendared for Jury trial on June 20, 2016 at 8:30am, Branch 21.

Defendant Jerome Demetrius Burks in court with attorney Robert J Hampton.  Margaret Anne Kunisch appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Jury trial scheduled for June 20, 2016 at 08:30 am.  Final pre-trial scheduled for May 23, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Jerome Demetrius Burks in court.  Margaret Anne Kunisch appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Unable to locate attorney. Court will adjourn the case for a Status.  Status conference scheduled for March 16, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT.

Attorney Robert J Hampton in court.  Margaret Anne Kunisch appeared for the State of Wisconsin.    Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a bench warrant issued but stayed the issuance until a Calendar Call / Projected Guilty Plea and Sentencing in Branch 4.  Calendar call scheduled for March 9, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

BRANCH 31 (HONORABLE JUDGE RIFELJ) FOR BRANCH 45 (HONORABLE JUDGE ACKERMAN-HAVAS)

Defendant Jerome Demetrius Burks in court with attorney Robert J Hampton.  Jennifer L Pickett appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for projected guilty plea and sentencing. For reasons stated on the record as to defendant time to complete community service. Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 45. All parties are notified that effective 2-1-15 this case will be assigned to Reserved Branch, Branch 04, in Room 515 of the Courthouse.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for February 24, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
Case spun to Branch 31, Judge Rifelj.

Defendant Jerome Demetrius Burks in court with attorney Robert J. Hampton.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Defense counsel requests a plea and sentencing date. Court orders case adjourned to Branch 45.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for January 27, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.
Defendant's Bail Forfeiture Notice returned undeliverable. For add. of 2445 W. Hopkins.

Court orders defendant TURNED OVER to JUSTICE Point for Supervision.  
Court ordered defendant to maintain ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.
Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription.
Defendant advised if released from custody it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.
Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping, a warrant issued or high cash bail.

Defendant Jerome Demetrius Burks in court with Student Intern Solomon Gatten under the supervision of Attorney Enku Edgar Lin.  
Defendant Jerome Demetrius Burks in custody.  
Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: sm

Scheduling conference scheduled for December 14, 2015 at 08:30 am., in Branch 45.

ADDRESS INFO for Jerome Demetrius Burks Jr
Current: 4400 S 27th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53221   (Effective: 11-30-2015)
Prior: 2445 W Hopkins St, Milwaukee, WI 53206
Notice of bond forfeiture mailed to defendant; Original in file. ($250.00 signature bond) gj
Signature bond ordered to be forfeited in the amount of 250.00.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT.

Attorney Robert J. Hampton in court prior to case being called.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case calendared for a pre-trial conference.  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued.

Defendant Jerome Demetrius Burks in court with attorney Robert J. Hampton.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
State has turned over an offer and discovery.  Defense requests time to review with defendant.  Court orders case adjourned for another pretrial conference in Branch 45.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for November 9, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant advised if released from custody it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.
Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping, a warrant issued or high cash bail.

ADDRESS INFO for Jerome Demetrius Burks Jr
Current: 2445 W Hopkins St, Milwaukee, WI 53206   (Effective: 09-23-2015)
Prior: 5045 North 38th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53209

Defendant Jerome Demetrius Burks in court with attorney Gabriela A Leija.  Defendant Jerome Demetrius Burks in custody.  Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk:  hgj.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Michelle Ackerman Havas, Branch 45.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 14, 2015 at 08:30 am.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE ARREST WARRANT.

Defendant Jerome Demetrius Burks not in court.  Denis John Stingl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
 Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered an Arrest Warrant to be issued.  Court ordered any bail posted to be forfeited.  State's motion for Judgment of Bond Forfeiture 30 days after notification from the Clerk of Circuit Court's Office is granted by the Court.  Court makes finding that there is no possible victim identified, therefore, recompense is not an issue.vb
Defendant is Out-of-Custody. Court appearance in Out-Of-Custody Court, Room 221 Safety Building on 9/4/15 @ 1:30 pm
